page.title: 15KILBURN:SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: { OUTDOOR FACILITIES At Belper Sports Centre there is a running track which is 440 metres around the outside and 200 metres across the middle. The lanes on it are 1.20 metres wide. There are pitches for Rugby, Football, Hockey and cricket and there is a floodlit all weather playing area. In a small area of the field there are 4 long jumps with a run up of 40metres. There are nine hard tennis courts which are also used for netball and basketball. {INDOOR FACILITIES {The swimming pool}at Belper Sports Centre measures 25 by 14 metres. At one end it is 2metres deep and at the other 90cm. It holds 105,000 gallons of water. The swimming pool was designed especially wide with a large area of shallow water so that there is no need for a teaching pool.
